question: You celebrated your birthday with some friends last week in a restaurant. It wasa great success and you and your friends enjoyed the evening very much.Write a letter to the restaurant to thank them. Mention the food, service and theatmosphere. Also suggest any improvements to make things better.
text: I am writing to let you know that I hosted my birthday party on the 25th of march at your hotel,The Royal Gardens.I am really thankful to your staff for hosting such a memorable party,which was enjoyed by friends,who specially flew from Dubai to be with me on my special day.

The A-la-carte menu was well planned,which included a variety of healthy oil-free dishes as well,which impressed my health freak friends.The friendly staff,who catered to our demands needs special commendation for their hard work and efficiency.The ambience was very pleasant and comfortable, especially as the banquet room was facing a huge garden area with lots of flowers.

But,I could like to suggest you  open more parking spaces,which caused a great inconvenience for us.We had to park near the exit of the hotel and walk all the way up.Other than this,it was overall a wonderful experience.
